formalpara.title: Internal help for this function in Asterisk 1.4:

para.screen:
-= Info about function 'SORT' =-
[Syntax] SORT(key1:val1[...][,keyN:valN])
[Synopsis] Sorts a list of key/vals into a list of keys, based upon the vals
[Description] Takes a comma-separated list of keys and values, each separated by a colon, and returns a comma-separated list of the keys, sorted by their values. Values will be evaluated as floating-point numbers.
